title: Design, synthesis and application of a magnetic H-bond catalyst in the preparation of new nicotinonitriles via cooperative vinylogous anomeric-based oxidation
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16607-16616
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01163E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mahdiyeh Navazeni, Mohammad Ali Zolfigol, Hossein Ahmadi, Hassan Sepehrmansourie, Ardeshir Khazaei, Mojtaba Hosseinifard
Herein, we designed and synthesized a new H-bond magnetic catalyst with 2-tosyl-N-(3-(triethoxysilyl)propyl)hydrazine-1-carboxamide as a sensitive H-bond donor/acceptor in the synthesis of new nicotinonitrile compounds.
